==Useful Info==
'''Lorocyprocas''' are innately [[invisible]] [[tier-2 demon]]s that sneak up on you and damage both [[HP]] and [[MP]] with their [[antimagic]] branded attacks. Although they aren't terribly durable, finding them in the first place can be a challenge, and any caster that lets them get into melee range will regret it. They can be found in [[the Abyss]] and [[Pandemonium]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*Lorocyprocas are just one of many reasons to keep up the [[see invisible]] intrinsic whenever you're somewhere demon-infested.
*Once they get within a few tiles of you, casters should treat them like [[eyes of draining]]; don't conserve your MP if the alternative is letting a monster simply take it away.

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|lorocyprocas will be removed from the game.}}
*Prior to [[0.10]], lorocyprocas were slightly slower than average and had an unbranded attack.
